spl_product_data_elements: Rinol-STroche flubiprofen FLURBIPROFEN FLURBIPROFEN MANNITOL LEVOMENTHOL PHARMKN
purpose: for swelling and sore throat symptoms, temporarily reduces feber, relieves swelling and sore throat for tonsillitis/peritonsillitis
keep_out_of_reach_of_children: Keep out of reach of children
